name: STAFF (ChibiMediaWorks)
description:
A small, first person dungeon crawler with a pre made layout. Influenced by the binding of issac and enter the gungeon.

Future updates include, staff selection screen for different runs, currency with shops, as well as powerups and more.

If you download and try the game out then I emplore you to please fill out the survey within this link. https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSflbkso8IciE8Q0l-_ljX6bNyoFOihj2e0B2BGb... This is a consent form and at the base of it is a link to the questionnaire.

Banner art by - https://ninten7.itch.io/
